mapper.select: SELECT ma.m_article_id AS meetArticleId, ma.category_id AS categoryId, ma.title, ma.content, ma.time, ma.enter, ma.hitcount, ma.member_id, ma.place_id, COALESCE(mt.tags, '') AS tags FROM meet_article ma LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.m_article_id, LISTAGG(t.tag_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY t.tag_name) AS tags FROM tag_article ta JOIN tag t ON ta.t_article_id = t.t_article_id GROUP BY ta.m_article_id ) mt ON ma.m_article_id = mt.m_article_id ORDER BY ma.m_article_id ASC
